title:
Why did they change the traffic light at Market Street and Gingerwood to make it so difficult to turn on to South College?

The green turn arrow only lasts about 3 seconds before it turns to flashing yellow. It used to stay green longer. Now, in the morning and evening, this creates back-ups on Market Street for those cars trying to turn left onto College Road.
